I tried to delete the wait time in the IntrospectionClient, but it seems the delay is caused due to this code segment:

while (result.empty()) { std::this_thread::sleep_for(0); slept += dur; result = this->Managers(); }

This loop runs until there is a manager found. This takes time. Sadly I do not know how we could fasten up the process of finding these managers.

A simple solution maybe is to call the function fillModels() (delay) after the Plotting Window show() function? So the window will appear and the models should be loaded before the user clicks on the models tab. Though this is not the best solution I guess.
